articles.title: Under the Banner of Heaven Premiere Review: First 2 Episodes - IGN
articles.description: Under the Banner of Heaven is a plodding adaptation that tries to tell too much and suffers under the weight of it all in its first two episodes.
articles.content:
Under the Banner of Heaven premieres with two episodes on April 28, 2022, on Hulu, with new episodes weekly on Thursdays.
